授業目的: The purpose of this class is for students to understand why US economy has been generating innovation which is a driving force of economy.
到達目標: Students will be able to understand the followings: (1) how US corporate strategies have generated innovation, (2) how US institution has been helpful for innovation, and (3) whether or not US government policies have promoted innovation.
授業の概要・背景: Because many advanced economies face slow pace of labor and capital growth, innovation is critical for econoimc growth as well as economic welfare. US has been innovative economy, so that graduate students need to understand her mechanism.
授業方法: Textbook 1 will be covered by lectures by the instructor and Textbook 2 will be covered by students' presentation.
